RelatedSentence: Police identified a 36 - year - old man who was fatally shot Saturday night in Southeast Washington .
Just before midnight Saturday , police received a report of a shooting in the 2700 block of Langston Place SE , just off Suitland Parkway .
When officers arrived , they found Simwone Keith Milstead of Southeast .
Police are continuing to investigate the incident and are offering a reward of up to $ 25,000 .
